articles.title: May 30 data: 5 deaths, 269 new confirmed COVID-19 cases - KUTV 2News

articles.title: First coronavirus-related syndrome affecting children reported in McKinley County - Navajo Times
articles.description: A syndrome associated with the coronavirus that affects children has affected an infant in McKinley County.
articles.content:
WINDOW ROCK
A syndrome associated with the coronavirus that affects children has affected an infant in McKinley County.
